items.title: Goodbye
items.comment: A common way to say goodbye in Mandarin, meaning 'see you again.'

items.title: Bye-bye
items.comment: A casual, borrowed expression from English, often used in informal settings.

items.title: Goodbye (formal)
items.comment: A more formal way of saying goodbye, less commonly used in daily speech.

items.title: See you later
items.comment: Used when you expect to see the person again soon.

items.title: See you tomorrow
items.comment: Used when parting ways with someone until the next day.

items.title: See you later (casual)
items.comment: A casual way to say 'see you later' in Mandarin.
